subsection.p: Site reorganized. Storage Toolbox added with permilinary Database support for PostgreSQL
Sequence Toolbox added. Needed by Data Storage Toolbox

Data Storage Toolbox added. Very alfa version. Just putting ideas in code. This is a DomainStore pattern implementation that does not assume data is stored in a database. However is design to provide database storage with the more efficient possible manner
Measures Toolbox moved to util package. Range and Interval moved directly to utils and out of measures

Core funcionatility rewritten to use OSGi Framework based on Apache Felix. This new core and bootstrap mechanism will effectively deprecates the use of the Service Toolbox and integrates a powerfull service lookup and dependency resolution mechanisms. More details on
ManagedFileRepository toolbox will be rewriten to use diferente engines and a engine based on Commons-VSF will be provided.
Inicial CVS commit with the first module: Measure
